text: Norman Wood (born 10 August 1932) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:Footballers from Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Silksworth Juniors F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Norman Wood (footballer, born 1932)
